headline.print_headline: Ex-Syrian Players Form Opposition Team in Exile
headline.main: Ex-Syrian Players Form Opposition Team in Exile

lead_paragraph: A group of Syrian refugees, all former professional soccer players and members of the national youth team in the war-wrecked country, came together in neighboring Lebanon over the past year to execute an ambitious task: Form an opposition team in exile that would become Syria's national team after the fall of President Bashar Assad's government.
